General.Name: EEMS Italia SpA
General.Description: EEMS Italia SpA operates in the semiconductor and photovoltaic sectors. It offers assembling and testing services for semiconductor and DRAM memories; and engineering, development, and installation services for turnkey photovoltaic systems. The company is based in Cittaducale, Italy.
General.Address: Viale delle Scienze, 5, Cittaducale, RI, Italy, 02015
